description:
Haru is Kurimi`s lover that died due to a plane accident.
[spoiler="Haru Past"]Because of his parent`s debt Haru been sent to slavery. He met his friend Ryuu there. Such harsh life resulted in him putting a high value in money.[/spoiler]
[spoiler="Story ending"]It was later revealed that Kurumi was the one that died in the plane crash. In order to escape the pain, Hal convinced himself he was a robot. In an effort to save him, Q01 was assigned the task of saving him by turning into Kurumi, in hopes of one day Hal will be able to move on from her death.[/spoiler]
name: Hal
